page.title: 02Parkend Carnival
page.content: The village carnival held on August Bank Holiday Monday is the one event which brings the whole village alive .The procession is usually three quarters of a mile long.It is led by the village Band followed by the Carnival Queen and her attendants , Jazz bands,marching bands ,decorated floats and walkers .Every year new ideas are presented in the floats and great care is taken by the villagers to avoid repetition of any idea that has already been used in a previous year.This usually sleepy village becomes alive with thousands of people gathered to watch this annual event. The parade winds its way around the village and into the sports field .The Queen and attendants take their place on stage for the announcement of the prize winners and the official opening of the fete.
